string.text: I'm hurt goddammit, can't you see that yourself? I need a medkit or at least a bandage.
Thanks bro', I won't forget it.
So how do you go around the Zone then? What if you're wounded? You won't even be able to heal yourself!
Heh, bad luck, man. Sorry but if I give you mine I won't have any left for myself.
It's your business, mate, but it doesn't do you any credit.
Help me out mate, would you?
